title: Royal Wedding
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Arthur Freed and Stanley Donen
brief_description: Fred Astaire delivers a magnificent series of dancing performances in this outstanding musical which also stars Jane Powell, Sarah Churchill, Peter Lawford and Keenan Wynn. Fred Astaire plays the role of a journalist sent to cover the Royal Wedding in London. This is the film which used the revolutionary photographic techniques which allowed Fred Astaire to do his famous “dancing on the ceiling”. Rated: G
